price: 56. Bakokuta o kati na yango basi kitoko ya miso ya minene baye batalaka pembeni te, mobali moko te kati ya bato to bilima asimba bango,
arabic: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fīhinna qāṣirātu al-ṭarfi lam yaṭmith'hunna insun qablahum walā jānnun
